title: No refund credits and i havent used my 3?
body: in essence I heard that now there are 3 refund credits per acct, and I just got back into playing league about 2 months ago(old acc) and today I overheard a buddy talking about how he used one of his refunds to get another skin he preffered. I got home, checked my summary page in the store and it says I have zero? Is it because my acct is old that I don't get refunds, or perhaps a mishap? because I haven't used any refunds to the last of my knowledge, took about a 2-3 yr break too.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it looks like your refund tokens were used a while, while back.  I can't really offer to many specifics over the boards due to account security, though.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing and account team can offer more context.  Let us also know if there you have any specific refund requests too, we'd be happy to take a look.  See you there!
